author: aloeliger
body:
### PR description:

Quick fix requested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/42185. This includes a check in `BXVector::push_back` that only includes the data if it is between `bxFirst_` and `bxLast_`, a `LogWarning` with some info is issued otherwise (I could remove that if complicating the buildfile and includes is undesirable). @perrotta you requested a fix like this.

### PR validation:

All code compiles and has had formatting and code checks done. I have not yet had the chance to make sure the workflows run with this present I'm afraid. I'm checking to make sure the workflow will run now.

### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This PR is not a backport, but could be backported to wherever https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42176 was if requested.
title: Add BX boundary checks for BXVector push_back
